data.title: ORANGESCAPE TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED HAVING CIN U72200TN2003PTC052129 IS 20 YEARS, 8 MONTHS & 6 DAYS OLD PRIVATE COMPANY at Falcon Ebiz
data.meta_description: Orangescape Technologies Private Limited having CIN U72200TN2003PTC052129 is 20 years, 8 months & 6 days old private company.Incorporated on 11 December, 2003 and located at Kanchipuram, Tamil Nadu
data.text:
ORANGESCAPE TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED / U72200TN2003PTC052129

LAST UPDATED : 30-05-2024 |

ORANGESCAPE TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED having CIN U72200TN2003PTC052129 is 20 years, 8 months & 6 days old Private company incorporated with MCA on 11th December, 2003. ORANGESCAPE TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED is listed in the class of Private company and classified as Non-govt company. This company is registered at Registrar of Companies(ROC), RoC-Chennai with an Authorized Share Capital of ₹2,50,00,000 and paid-up capital is ₹51,59,850.

The company has 3 directors/key management personal SURESH SABAPATHY SAMBANDAM, SABAPATHY SAMBANDAM, ARAVIND SURESH. ORANGESCAPE TECHNOLOGIES PVT LTD company registration number is 052129 and its Corporate Identification Number(CIN) provided from MCA is U72200TN2003PTC052129.

As per MCA records ORANGESCAPE TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED is involved in activities such as Computer and related activities

ORANGESCAPE TECHNOLOGIES PVT LTD's registered office address is World Trade Centre, Unit 1002&1003,eastwing,towerb 5/142,10th Floor, Rajiv Gandhi Salai, Pe, Rungudi, Chennai, Old Mahabalipuram Road, Tamil Nadu, India, 600096. Find other contact information for ORANGESCAPE TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED such as contact number, email, website, gst details and more below.

ORANGESCAPE TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED's last Annual General Meeting(AGM) was held on 22nd September, 2023, and the company last updated its financials on 31st March, 2023.

Current status of ORANGESCAPE TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED is Active.
